title: It\'s 1:53pm on Tuesday and I just felt tremor for about 15 seconds which was shaking my whole house in mid-town Wilmington...what was it?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110823/ARTICLES/110829902/1177?Title=Quake-felt-in-Wilmington-centered-in-Va-
